root.SourceConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = DB3;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.TargetConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = CLZ;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.SelectQuery: select CONVERT(varchar, DEAL_TIME, 111 ) as [DEAL_TIME],SUM(GOODS_CASH) as [GOODS_CASH],SUM(DEAL_COUNT) as [DEAL_COUNT],SUM(MANAGE_FEE) as [MANAGE_FEE] from [HISTORY_SETTLE_DEAL_MAIN] group by CONVERT(varchar, DEAL_TIME, 111 );
